HiddenText.Name: What is my role in the process?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What is my role in the student grievance process?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: If you are the instructor in question, we ask that you communicate with your Teaching Group Leader and the student to walk through the issue. If you are a Teaching Group Leader, we ask that you fully investigate the grievance and work with the instructor and student to bring the issue to resolution. Further information is included in the official policy, and in the email that is sent to the Teaching Group Leader.
